html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-00042024-01-11PMO
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisOrder directing that a COMMISSION do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering any person appointed as Deputy Clerk of the Privy Council and Intelligence Advisor to the Prime Minister, including NATHALIE G. DROUIN, the current holder of that office, to administer, to any person who holds or is authorized to hold office, or who may be appointed to discharge any duty, on behalf of the Government of Canada, the Oath of Allegiance and the Oath of Office, and any other oath as may from time to time be prescribed by law, and to have that power during their tenure of office as Deputy Clerk of the Privy Council and National Security and Intelligence Advisor to the Prime Minister.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order directing that a COMMISSION do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering any person appointed as Deputy Clerk of the Privy Council and Intelligence Advisor to the Prime Minister, including NATHALIE G. DROUIN, the current holder of that office, to administer, to any person who holds or is authorized to hold office, or who may be appointed to discharge any duty, on behalf of the Government of Canada, the Oath of Allegiance and the Oath of Office, and any other oath as may from time to time be prescribed by law, and to have that power during their tenure of office as Deputy Clerk of the Privy Council and National Security and Intelligence Advisor to the Prime Minister.
